option.name: notice
option.value:
Copyright (c) 2018 Absa Bank Limited, All Rights Reserved.
This code is confidential to Absa Bank Limited and shall not be disclosed outside the Bank without the prior written permission of the Absa Legal
In the event that such disclosure is permitted the code shall not be copied or distributed other than on a need-to-know basis and any recipients may be required to sign a confidentiality undertaking in favor of Absa Bank Limited
